description:
Manages a Blob Target within a HPC Cache.

~> **NOTE:**: By request of the service team the provider no longer automatically registering the `Microsoft.StorageCache` Resource Provider for this resource. To register it you can run `az provider register --namespace 'Microsoft.StorageCache'`.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AccessPolicyName.description: The name of the access policy applied to this target. Defaults to `default`.

CacheName.description: The name HPC Cache, which the HPC Cache Blob Target will be added to. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Name.description: The name of the HPC Cache Blob Target. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

NamespacePath.description: The client-facing file path of the HPC Cache Blob Target.

ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the Resource Group in which to create the HPC Cache Blob Target. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

StorageContainerId.description: The Resource Manager ID of the Storage Container used as the HPC Cache Blob Target. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
